argument.description: An expression that returns a value of any built-in or user-defined data type.
An expression that returns a value of any built-in or user-defined data type.

description: The COALESCE function returns the first non-null expression in a list of expressions.
sample:
SELECT DEPTNO, DEPTNAME, COALESCE(MGRNO, 'ABSENT'), ADMRDEPT
     FROM DEPARTMENT
